" i do n't like listening to comedians tell me how the world works , " kinane says . " that 's why the gruff - voiced comic 's sets are anchored by anecdotes about the mundane that play as delightfully absurd . when kinane did tackle politically relevant material in his set for the netflix series " the standups " earlier this year , it came in a farcical bit about how ku klux klan members surely partake in cuisine from the cultures they oppress .
